statements: UPDATE attendance SET workshop_name = 'Workshop A', workshop_date = '2021-10-15' WHERE id = 1

UPDATE attendance SET workshop_name='SQL Basics', workshop_date='2022-10-15' WHERE participant_name='Alice';
UPDATE attendance SET workshop_date='2022-11-20', participant_name='Bob' WHERE workshop_name='Python Advanced';
UPDATE attendance SET date_attended = '2022-01-10' WHERE attendee_id = 1 AND workshop_id = 101;
UPDATE workshops SET workshop_type = 'Webinar', workshop_name = 'Marketing Strategies' WHERE workshop_id = 105;
UPDATE attendance SET date_attended = '2022-10-20' WHERE attendee_id = 1 AND workshop_id = 3;

UPDATE workshops SET workshop_duration = 3, workshop_location = 'Paris' WHERE workshop_id = 1;

UPDATE Workshop SET instructor='John Doe', workshop_name='Advanced SQL Workshop' WHERE workshop_id = 1;
